mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( merchant_id, product_name, amount, count, user_idx ) VALUES ( #{merchantId}, #{productName}, #{amount}, #{count}, #{userIdx} )
mapper.select: SELECT reserve_id as reserveId, merchant_id as merchantId, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_at) as createAt, amount, product_name as productName, count, user_idx as userIdx, status FROM reservation where reserve_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( merchant_id, product_name, amount, count, user_idx ) VALUES ( #{merchantId}, #{productName}, #{amount}, #{count}, #{userIdx} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET status = 'Temporary' WHERE reserve_id = #{reserveId}
